text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Several days after the Tracen Meet, I<n>stop by the training
course, only to<n>notice the students crowded around a<n>
certain area.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... I finished!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems the students are competing<n>with each other in
mock races. As I<n>look past the winning racer, I see a<n>
familiar face.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Cough... wheeze... I... finished...too!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff... L-looks like I lost...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: That was a lot of fun though! Thanks,<n>Urara!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I'm the one who should be thanking<n>you! But watch out! I
won't lose next<n>time!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: All righty... Who should I race<n>nex—Hm? Ah, it's you again!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: No way, this is totally different! I'm<n>dojo storming!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I read aaall about it in a comic book!<n>You go up to strong
people, challenge<n>them, and win!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
The comic said that was the secret to<n>getting stronger, so I
thought I'd try it<n>out!
choice_data_list: But it looks like you lost...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Yeah, but I just know I'll win thenext one!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: The dojo storming continues! My<n>next opponent will be...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ah! Spe! Hey, Special Week!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, hello, Urara! Are you training too?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Yup, and I came up with a new way to<n>do it too! Spe... I
challenge you!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? Challenge?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Now you've gotta race me!<n>Come on, Spe! Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: What? Right now?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With that, Haru Urara has found her<n>next dojo to storm.
However...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Across the line!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A while after Special Week finishes,<n>an exhausted Haru
Urara approaches<n>the finish line.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Wheeze... Finished...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: N-no more...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh no, Urara!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's clear that Haru Urara's tenacity<n>outmatches her
stamina. While she<n>may have crossed the finish line, she<n>
collapses almost immediately after.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Phew, I thought I was gonna pass<n>out!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You did pass out...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Well, no worries either way! I'm all<n>rested and ready for
anything!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Still, you really are amazing, Spe! A<n>worthy rival, for sure!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Th-thank you?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Don't get too cocky though! I won't<n>lose next time!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: After seeing you run like the wind, Ijust know I can do the same!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: All right then, let's race again<n>sometime!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I'm gonna hold you to that!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Okay... Back to dojo storming! My<n>next challenge awaits!
Bring it on!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah... There she goes...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
That energy of hers really is<n>something else. She's always
so<n>cheerful.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I know, right?! I always feel so bad<n>after losing, but Urara is
ready to<n>accept the next challenge no matter<n>what...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Her fearless attitude gives me<n>motivation to try harder.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And talking about motivation, I better<n>get back to work too!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Whether it's the Tracen Meet or dojo<n>storming, Haru Urara
continues on<n>with a smile, even in defeat.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And it's become clear to me that her<n>optimism is
contagious.
